Title: Doctor Who - An Adventure In Space And Time
Plot: Written by Mark Gatiss, this drama chronicles the genesis of Doctor Who and the dramatic build-up to its first broadcast on 23 November 1963. It is the story of how an unlikely set of brilliant people created a true television original. And how an actor - William Hartnell - stereotyped in hard-man roles became a hero to millions of children. Discover how Doctor Who captivated the whole country - and how close it came to extermination!
